entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times late this evening and after midnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
